abstract: NBC scored a victory in the ratings on the last Sunday of 2007 thanks to its prime time football coverage, which earned approximately 14 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s overnight estimates. CBS and Fox finished second and third, respectively, with both networks benefiting from overruns of their own football coverage, which extended well into the 7 p.m. hour.
